title: The Power of Persistence
description: Learn about how Kalpana Chawla's persistence led her to space despite facing numerous obstacles.

title: The Miracle of Kindness
description: Discover how a small act of kindness can make a big difference in someone's life.

title: Overcoming Fear
description: Explore how Bachendri Pal overcame her fear  to become the first Indian Woman to summit the Everest.
